import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Button, Modal, ModalHeader, ModalBody, Input, Table, FormGroup, Col, Row, Form, } from "reactstrap"; import { connect } from "react-redux"; import { getTarjetas } from "../../../store/actions/tarjetaActions"; const CynTarjetasModal = (props) => { const { buttonLabel, className } = props; const [modal, setModal] = useState(false); const toggle = () => setModal(!modal); const { tarjetas } = props.tarjetas; console.log(tarjetas); return (

{item.numero} {item.color} {tarjetas && tarjetas .filter( ({ numero, color }) => color === item.color && numero === item.numero ) .map(({ estado }) => { return estado; })}
); }; const mapStateToProps = (state) => { return { tarjetas: state.tarjetas, }; }; export default connect(mapStateToProps, { getTarjetas })(CynTarjetasModal);
